messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

advice needed for friday pm advice needed hi advised by reach out ask help regarding issue happened yesterday please take explanation looking forward hear regards engineer ext re advice needed hello please issue thank lead advice needed hi wanted consult regarding were requesting partitions two completed yesterday third person prolongation due duties hold yesterday also wrote comment hold details section ago user brought finished task then opened ticked changed awaiting user directly resolved which caused planned date change color has never happened were times had hold various reasons please advise order issue fixed thanks engineer ext
